    • Constructor Detail

      • TokenAuthenticator

        public TokenAuthenticator(TokenDAO tokenDAO,
                          int expirationHours)
        Creates a new TokenAuthenticator.
        Parameters:
        tokenDAO - The TokenDAO used to query the issued tokens from data storage.
        expirationHours - The number of hours the token should be considered valid.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(TokenSecret secret,
                            TokenUse use)
                     throws ExpiredTokenException,
                            DataAccessException
        Attempts to validate the provided token.
        Parameters:
        secret - The token secret to authenticate.
        use - The usage of the token to authenticate.
        Returns:
        true when the token is authenticated.
        Throws:
        ExpiredTokenException - When the provided token was valid, but has since expired.
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.
